name: CSV Import into BigTable
description: Import multiple CSV files into Bigtable

parameters.name: bigtableProjectId
parameters.label: Bigtable's GCP Project Id
parameters.helpText: The GCP project Id of having the Bigtable resource.

parameters.name: inputFile
parameters.label: GCS File path
parameters.helpText: The GCS files to import. Supports standard wildcard characters

parameters.name: headers
parameters.label: CSV Header in sequence
parameters.helpText: List of headers of the CSV file

parameters.name: rowKeyHeader
parameters.label: CSV Header to use as rowKey
parameters.helpText: The CSV Header to be used as a row Key.

parameters.name: csvFormat
parameters.label: CSV file format
parameters.helpText: The CSV Fileformat to use as per CSVFormat.Predefined.

parameters.name: bigtableColumnFamilyName
parameters.label: Bigtable Column Family Name
parameters.helpText: The Column family used to create the provided CSV columns. Default: csv
